thread.title_full: RG Riley reviewed by Robert Hitzler

author: Robert Hitzler
title: Robert Hitzler
text: I was on line looking for clothing items that I could place in the Operation Christmas child Shoe boxes that are sent all over the world to the poor. I found RG Riley on line and contacted them. The sales man was very helpful we purchased 300 t shirts. The product was very good, the price was good (we bought 300 t shirts of various sizes for fifty cents each). They were placed in the boxes and I am sure they brought much happiness to the recipients. Thank you RG Riley
